artist: Manufacturer: Worcester Porcelain Works (a.k.a. Royal Worcester Porcelain Company)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. W. C. MacFarlane
description: Tea Service, wide coral colored bands with gilt scroll decorations , consisting of .1-4 Teacups, .5 plate, .6 sugar bowl, .7 creamer, .8 waste bowl, porcelain.
object_name: Cup and Saucer from a Tea Service
title: Cup and Saucer from a Tea Service
